message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.GT, cs.IT. 

The paper deals with the problem of adversarial multi-armed bandits, which is a well-studied problem in machine learning and optimization. The paper also resolves several open problems in online learning, which is a subfield of machine learning. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms). The paper also involves game theory (cs.GT) and information theory (cs.IT) concepts, which are relevant to the problem.
